document_data.name: Home of Chininsk Ambar
document_data.basicrefs: {{cite book/Desert of Desolation|90}}{{cite book/Desert of Desolation|92}}
document_data.mainbody: The '''Home of Chininsk Ambar''' was an amusement in the city of [[Phoenix (city)|Phoenix]] within the [[Raurin]].
document_data.Location: The building lay submerged beneath the sands in the city of [[Phoenix (city)|Phoenix]].
document_data.Inhabitants: The only object of value was the lamp of [[El-Tarifa]], an aerial servant who used to be the butler for [[Chininsk Ambar]]. If helped return all in the library to its proper place, it would stay with its helpers and perform up to one service that did not go against its nature (it was a good-aligned creature).
